column4: anyone able to help cant get edgy to connect to wired network
anyone able to help cant get edgy to connect to wired network
is it dhcp or fixed ip?
so its a router your connecting to?
enable the router for dhcp and then on ubuntu run sudo dhclient eth0
assuming the ethernet port your using is eth0
just get a load of DHCPDISCOVER messages then no DHCPOFFERS received
do you have more than one NIC in the pc?
you sure the router is set to offer dhcp and is not set to restrict connections by MAC address?
yes it works in windows using DHCP
what does ifconfig eth0 say (pastebin it)
fixed disabled ipv6 and it worked
